script.name: plugin.guilds.dipl.examinesec.m
script.sourceplaintext:
$DEFINE.INFLUENCE = 150 $page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds' $Guilds.Data = get global variable: name='guilds.data'
if is datatype[ $a.event ] == DATATYPE_AGENTCOMMAND $sector = $a.data[0] $trade.dock = $a.data[1] send script event: name='guilds.examinesector', object=$a.obj, param1=$sector, param2=$trade.dock START $a.obj ->open menu script: script=plugin.guilds.dipl.examinesec.m, value=$a.data return null
else if $a.event == [MEvent.IsSpy] return [FALSE]
else if $a.event == [MEvent.AllowMultiple] return [FALSE]
else if $a.event == [MEvent.IsDisabled] $got = get influence of Player -> Privateer $influence = get influence bonus decrease: race=Privateer amount=$DEFINE.INFLUENCE if $got >= $influence return [FALSE] else return [TRUE] end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Influence] return $DEFINE.INFLUENCE
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY gosub sub.DisplayReport else gosub sub.BuildMenu end return $input
else if $a.event == 'examine.sector' if $a.data $a.obj ->set local variable: name='sector' value=$a.data $arr = create new array, arguments=Privateer Support Station, Privateer Supply Base, null, null, null $homebase = $a.obj -> get homebase $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=92002 $input = create input: id='trade.dock', user input=Var/Station, refobj=$homebase, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=$arr, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input else return [FALSE] end
else if $a.event == 'trade.dock' if $a.data $a.obj ->set local variable: name='trade.dock' value=$a.data return [TRUE] else return [FALSE] end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Arguments] $sector = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='sector' $trade.dock = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='trade.dock' $ret = create new array, arguments=$trade.dock, $sector, null, null, null return $ret
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] $a.obj ->set local variable: name='sector' value=null $a.obj ->set local variable: name='trade.dock' value=null end
return null
sub.BuildMenu: $menu = create custom menu array
$drawn = 0
$contested.sectors = $Guilds.Data['contested.sectors'] if $contested.sectors $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$contested.sectors $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $sector = $sorted.array[$i] inc $i =
add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$sector returnvalue=$sector inc $drawn = end end
if not $drawn $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end
set menu option: $menu, icon=163
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=92003 $input = create input: id='examine.sector' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$a.obj callback=null endsub
sub.DisplayReport: $menu = create custom menu array
$sector = $a.data[0] $trade.dock = $a.data[1]
$sector.data = $Guilds.Data['contested.sectors'][$sector] if $sector.data $name = $trade.dock -> get name $dock.sector = $trade.dock -> get sector $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=92012, $a.obj, $sector, $dock.sector, $name, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text add info line section to menu: $menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=92005 $read.text = sprintf: fmt='%s:', $read.text, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text
$drawn = 0 $height = 8
$maximum = $sector.data[6] skip if $maximum $maximum = 10000
$tFactions = $sector.data[2] if $tFactions $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$tFactions $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $faction = $sorted.array[$i] $faction.data = $tFactions[$faction] inc $i =
if is datatype[ $faction.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $text.cols = array alloc: size=2 if $faction == Player $player.name = get player name $text = create custom menu column string, position=30 length=120 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Player] text=$player.name else $text = create custom menu column string, position=30 length=120 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$faction end $text.cols[0] = $text
$progress = $faction.data[2] $progress = fixed multiply and divide: $progress * 100 / $maximum $text = create custom menu string progress: width=150 progress=$progress% $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=150 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.cols inc $drawn = end end end
if not $drawn inc $height = $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text else $height = $height + $drawn end
$drawn = 0
add info line section to menu: $menu
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=92038 $read.text = sprintf: fmt='%s:', $read.text, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text
$tSupport = $sector.data[7] if $tSupport $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$tSupport $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $faction = $sorted.array[$i] $faction.data = $tSupport[$faction] inc $i =
$text = sprintf: fmt='%s => %s', $faction, $faction.data, null, null, null if $faction.data == Player $text = create custom menu column string, position=30 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Player] text=$text else $text = create custom menu column string, position=30 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text end $text.cols = create new array, size=1, elements=$text, null, null, null, null, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.cols inc $drawn = end end
if not $drawn inc $height = $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text else $height = $height + $drawn end end
set menu option: $menu, icon=123 set menu option: $menu, no select lines=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, maximum menu height=$height lines
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=92011 $input = create input: id='examine.report' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$sector callback=null endsub
return null
